TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CodeActivity extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity
Public NotInheritable Class CodeActivity Inherits Activity

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 執行與活動相關聯之程式碼除外的方法。

span.span: Runs the code-beside method associated with an activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 以同步方式執行由 叫用之程式碼除外的方法； 在完成執行緒之前不會產生其執行緒。Code-beside methods invoked by are executed in a synchronous manner; does not yield its thread until the thread is finished. 因此，會預期執行程式碼除外的方法，且不會封鎖在某些外部資源上的相依性。Therefore, the execution of the code-beside method is expected to be performed and should not block with a dependency on some external resource. 例如，程式碼除外的方法通常不叫用 Web 服務。For example, the code-beside method should typically not invoke a Web service. 的一般用法是查看工作流程執行個體狀態，並變更區域變數和訊息。The typical use of the is to examine workflow instance state, and change local variables and messages.
